metadata.description: Long ago in ANOTHER galaxy farther away... Rod Espinosa, the creator of Courageous Princess, strikes back, bringing a new hope with a tale of stalwart steampunk sovereign!  The empire has sent its best assassins to kill the last of the warriors of light.  But they are in for a rude surprise when they take on one light warrior too many!
metadata.name: Steam Wars: Princess Legends
